contentrichtext.text: '''Jim''' or '''Jimmy Crawford''' may refer to: ==Athletes== * [[Jim Crawford (racing driver)]] (1948–2002), Scottish auto racing driver * [[Jimmy Crawford (racing driver)]] (1944–2007), retired NASCAR Cup Series driver * [[Jim Crawford (footballer)]] (born 1973), Irish footballer * [[Jim Crawford (boxer)]], Australian boxer * [[Jim Crawford (baseball)]] (born 1950), former baseball player * [[Jim Crawford (American football)]] (born 1935), American football player for the Boston Patriots ==Fictional characters== * [[Jimmy Crawford (Home and Away)]], fictional character on the Australian soap opera, ''Home and Away'' ==Musicians== * [[Jimmy Crawford (drummer)]] (1910–1980), American jazz drummer of the swing era * [[Jimmy Crawford (British singer)]] (born 1937), British pop singer in the 1960s ==Politicians== * [[James W. Crawford, Jr.]] (born 1937), Democratic member of the North Carolina General Assembly ==See also== * [[James Crawford (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Crawford, Jim}}
